welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tondabayashicho, a charming city known for its historical sites, beautiful parks, and delicious local cuisine. We hope you enjoy your time here and explore all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Kansai International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Itami Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Itami Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal serving domestic flights within Japan.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
